name: Tamori's Picross
description:
Tamori no Picross ("Tamori's Picross") is a series of Picross games released on Super Famicom, via BS-X (Satellaview) broadcast system in 1995. Due to the fact that it was released prior to Mario no Super Picross, it was believed to be a "experimental version" of it. It was broadcasted on brief dates in 1995, being able to be downloaded only on that certain periods. So far, there are 4 known episodes: 6/13, 6/26, 8/13 and 4/23.
Despite its titular reference to the Japanese comedian Kazuyoshi Morita aka Tamori, he doesn't appear in the series at all.
